ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And the shaytans, every builder and diver,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the devils -- the builders and divers of all kinds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We also subjected the devils to him -- all kinds of builders and divers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and all the devils who built and dived for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And made the demons subservient to him, all builders and divers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Shayatin, from every kind of builder and diver,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the shaitans, every builder and diver,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the Satans, every builder and diver
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the unruly, every builder and diver (made We subservient),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and also the jinn, every kind of builder and diver
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We subjected to him the evil ones: every builder and diver.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and every builder and diver from the demons,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As also the evil ones, (including) every kind of builder and diver,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And also the Shayatin (devils) from the jinns (including) every kind of builder and diver,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the satans, every builder and diver
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the demons—every builder and diver.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:37] And the devils [also We disposed], every builder, building marvellous edifices, and diver, in the sea, bringing up pearls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And) also made subservient (the unruly) the devils, (every builder and diver) into the bottom of the sea,
